Package gameMain

Class student

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameMain.NPC
      • gameMain.student

  • public class student
extends NPC
    This class is for a type of NPC called a student. A student walks from class to class and can only damage the player if they are running (which will happen moments before class starts or if the pc attacks). Students can only walk on paths or crosswalks.
    See Also:
